Preterit.turoyo: qayəmaṯi u=zʕuro, zbəṭle u=məšḥo w kfəxle b-feme d-Kayalo w hiyedamixo 229; 76/153;

Infectum.turoyo: k-owe u=laly-awoaʕlayye g-dumxi. k-soyəmṭlawḥe, g-maḥəttaḥt u=ḥa w k-soyəmmayešaḥine k-kofəxtaḥt u=ḥreno229; 6/90; mḥalaqle i=šlad-ayo d-u=ʕammo d-Murād, ʕal-as=salun-anək, w-amṭele am=mayešaḥineraṯiḥ-anək k-kofəxaʕleMurādannaqla i=čaqanenafəqəšmaayko-va d-kītḥakayiwoḥakibemede k-oṯe ko-soyəmqəṣ d-u=šēx-ano ko-moli-la mayekəfxi-la b-qarʕe
translations: ‘The bath became famous. Wherever there was someone ill…he would come and reach the
the bath with water and pour it on his head’ 78/203;

Imperativ.turoyo: duq u=gelo w arṯeḥ-e b-maye w kfax-e b-u=fənžān w ḥeṭ-e b-ʕayne d-babux, g-nayḥi 229; prs 129/19;

Preterit.turoyo: l-Ḥasané Aliki čəkleiḏe b-ak=kəstotayḏe, mədle tarte=lappat d-liratmakfaxle b-sefe d-ḤasanéKačal 229; 95/274;
